channel.title: Gielinor - New RSPS Idea, - Need server developers
channel.description:
[b]Introduction[/b]
My name is Sam and I'm first and foremost a RuneScape fan/ I moved to RSPS's years back and have been playing on and off. I've been involved in many projects, some of them mine and some of them as part of a team. I'm looking to find a dedicated team of server developers to come aboard my project. I'm a web developer myself and I already have the site designed, online and ready for action.
[b]What/Who I'm looking for[/b]
I'm looking for skilled Java server developers that implement with ease the features I want the server to have. I need a team to take a decent base, stabilise it and work together to introduce and maintain the features the server needs.
I think it's hard to define the criteria via a check-list but I've attempted to list the qualities I'm looking for.
[ul][li] Maturity - I need mature developers that can work well with direction from myself.[/li] [li] Creativity - I need the feedback and suggestions of any developer in my team and I will give anyone involved a lot of freedom on this project.[/li] [li] Responsibility - I need commitment and assurance from developers on my team, if something needs to be done I expect it to get done.[/li] [li] Experience - A very important factor I need experience coders that can implement custom code and features, someone who can maintain/ develop and fix problems. Not someone who can just follow a tutorial.[/li][/ul]
[b]Current Set-up[/b]
~ Website - registered .net domain - Custom design (by myself) and fully operational. ~ VPS Server (Windows) * 6GHz Processor * 8GB RAM * 60GB SSD Storage * Unlimited Bandwidth (Low Ping / DDoS Resistant)
[b]Contact / Further Information[/b]
If you're interested then please either send me a PM or add my on skype ([b]samnicholson5[/b])
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Gielinor - New RSPS Idea, - Need server developers
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:10, topic:509241”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=627483.msg4264530#msg4264530 date=1363879740]
Does that seriously say 6GHz processor? Multiple cores != “add the speeds together”
[/quote]

With silabs new source it does.[/quote]
No, it still doesn’t work that way. If that’s the case, I got a 14.4ghz processor for $60. Nothing uses all of the cores even if you program it to though, one core can do all of the calculations so it maxes out at around 3ghz for most applications (like 8ghz for games like skyrim).

Read full topic
item.source: Gielinor - New RSPS Idea, - Need server developers

item.title: Gielinor - New RSPS Idea, - Need server developers
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:509241”][quote author=AriaScape link=topic=627483.msg4264124#msg4264124 date=1363801876]

Payment

Payment is negotiable depending on what you’re going to deliver. If you just want to do some work and leave then we can negotiate a fixed price. If you’d like to join the team and stay with Gielinor, maintaining and developing then a percentage of all revenue will given to you, - again depending on involvement.

You can’t offer a payment for services on MoparScape, if you had read the rules you’d realise this. Also, what shows people that you’re what you say you are? You haven’t provided any proof on this thread that you’re actually capable of running a project this size?

Regardless of the above, good luck.

Apologies for the payment part. I’m just looking for developers and all discussion on payment will be done off-site.

If you would of read the thread you’d understand that the only thing I have at the moment is a website, I’ve stated that I need developers to work together to choose a base and implement required features. I can’t give pictures of something that doesn’t actually exist.

I’m also confused as to who you say I’m claiming to be? I’m sure I just called myself a RSPS enthusiast and that over the years I’ve run and been part of teams, a common thing for anyone who plays an RSPS.

As for the remark to a “project of this size”, I simply have a website and a VPS… Not sure what gave you the indication I was anything more, yes I’d like it to get big and be popular but what I’m looking for is clearly stated above. I’m a web developer and it’s a big part of my IRL job. I don’t really want to release URL but if you’re not convinced I can PM you the link.

Thank you for your support.
[/quote]

No. You’ve picked me up wrong :P. I wasn’t taking anything against your website or anything, I also realise that post was a little on the arrogant side, my apologies. I’m mainly saying that because of the fact you’re a newer member to MoparScape and no-one here knows if they can trust you or if you are in fact a competent website developer or project manager. Once again, I didn’t mean it to be as arrogant as that :P.

Just ignore the above comments

Why would anyone ignore valid questions? lol[/quote]

You should know I just switch on when people mention money and i’ll easily fine out if hes legit

Read full topic
item.source: Gielinor - New RSPS Idea, - Need server developers

If you’d like to join the team and stay with Gielinor, maintaining and developing then a percentage of all revenue will given to you, - again depending on involvement.

You can’t offer a payment for services on MoparScape, if you had read the rules you’d realise this. Also, what shows people that you’re what you say you are? You haven’t provided any proof on this thread that you’re actually capable of running a project this size?

Regardless of the above, good luck.
[/quote]

Apologies for the payment part. I’m just looking for developers and all discussion on payment will be done off-site.

If you would of read the thread you’d understand that the only thing I have at the moment is a website, I’ve stated that I need developers to work together to choose a base and implement required features. I can’t give pictures of something that doesn’t actually exist.

I’m also confused as to who you say I’m claiming to be? I’m sure I just called myself a RSPS enthusiast and that over the years I’ve run and been part of teams, a common thing for anyone who plays an RSPS.

As for the remark to a “project of this size”, I simply have a website and a VPS… Not sure what gave you the indication I was anything more, yes I’d like it to get big and be popular but what I’m looking for is clearly stated above. I’m a web developer and it’s a big part of my IRL job. I don’t really want to release URL but if you’re not convinced I can PM you the link.

Thank you for your support.[/quote]

No. You’ve picked me up wrong :P. I wasn’t taking anything against your website or anything, I also realise that post was a little on the arrogant side, my apologies. I’m mainly saying that because of the fact you’re a newer member to MoparScape and no-one here knows if they can trust you or if you are in fact a competent website developer or project manager. Once again, I didn’t mean it to be as arrogant as that :P.

Arcik:

Just ignore the above comments

Why would anyone ignore valid questions? lol

I’m a web developer and it’s a big part of my IRL job. I don’t really want to release URL but if you’re not convinced I can PM you the link.

Thank you for your support.

item.title: Gielinor - New RSPS Idea, - Need server developers
item.dc:creator: @AriaScape AriaScape
item.description:
@AriaScape wrote:

Introduction

My name is Sam and I’m first and foremost a RuneScape fan/ I moved to RSPS’s years back and have been playing on and off. I’ve been involved in many projects, some of them mine and some of them as part of a team. I’m looking to find a dedicated team of server developers to come aboard my project. I’m a web developer myself and I already have the site designed, online and ready for action.

What/Who I’m looking for

I’m looking for skilled Java server developers that implement with ease the features I want the server to have. I need a team to take a decent base, stabilise it and work together to introduce and maintain the features the server needs.

I think it’s hard to define the criteria via a check-list but I’ve attempted to list the qualities I’m looking for.

[ul][li] Maturity - I need mature developers that can work well with direction from myself.[/li]
[li] Creativity - I need the feedback and suggestions of any developer in my team and I will give anyone involved a lot of freedom on this project.[/li]
[li] Responsibility - I need commitment and assurance from developers on my team, if something needs to be done I expect it to get done.[/li]
[li] Experience - A very important factor I need experience coders that can implement custom code and features, someone who can maintain/ develop and fix problems. Not someone who can just follow a tutorial.[/li][/ul]

Current Set-up

~ Website - registered .net domain - Custom design (by myself) and fully operational.
~ VPS Server (Windows)

  • 6GHz Processor
  • 8GB RAM
  • 60GB SSD Storage
  • Unlimited Bandwidth (Low Ping / DDoS Resistant)

Contact / Further Information

If you’re interested then please either send me a PM or add my on skype (samnicholson5)

Thanks for reading.
